title: Arches National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Bring red rock country to your 1st - 6th grade students with these field trips and lesson plans. Topics are taken from the 2003 Utah State Science Core Curriculum guidelines and correlated to the National Science Standards. All Curriculum Materials       Living & Non-living Interactions Learn More     Materials to Loan Visiting Arches with your students? Check out a Field Trip in a Box, complete with lesson plans, materials, and suggested activites to help you teach your students about Geology, Microorganisms, or Desert Adaptations.  All Materials to Loan       Field Trip in a Box: Microorganisms Learn More     Field Trips Find resources for planning your own field trip to Arches, including fee waiver forms, park and campground information, and more. All Field Trips       Plan your field trip to Arches Learn More
